contentrichtext.text: '''The XY Notrump''' [[Bridge convention|convention]] is a bidding convention in [[contract bridge]]. == Using the convention == After opener's one of a suit (X), partner's one of a suit response (Y) and opener's 1NT rebid (a very common sequence), 2{{Clubs}} from opener's partner forces 2{{Diams}} from opener. Holding a weak hand with diamonds, one can now pass. Other bids are invitational, describing also the nature of the hand. A 2{{Diams}} response to 1NT, however, is game forcing with any hand. Responder may also jump to 3 of any suit (except 3{{Clubs}}, which is signoff) to show a slammish hand with good suit(s). == Examples == For example, on the sequence 1{{Clubs}}-1{{Spades}} (with our without opponent's interfering);1NT-2{{Clubs}};2{{Diams}},2{{Hearts}} will show an invitational hand with minimum five spades and four hearts, 2{{Spades}} an invitational hand with minimum five spades (in which case one does not have four hearts) or possibly six spades with or without four hearts. 2NT will show a balanced invitational hand, 3{{Clubs}} typically an unbalanced invitational hand with club support. However, when one instead forces game with 2{{Diams}}, opener will immediately start describing his own hand. He may, on basis of the aforementioned auction, with 2{{Diams}} being the only difference, bid 2{{Hearts}} holding four hearts, 2{{Spades}} holding three card spade support, etc. Further bids are primarily natural. == Advantages == XY Notrump gives very good control finding both games and slams, as the final "mission" of the sequence is established at a relatively early stage of bidding. Playing, as very common in combination with XY no trump, the [[Walsh convention]] or even [[Transfer Walsh]], one still has the chance of stopping in 2{{Diams}} on weak hands, often impossible using for example [[Stayman convention#Checkback Stayman|Checkback Stayman]]. == Variations == A popular expanded version of XY Notrump is the so-called "XYZ" [http://bridgehands.com/X/XYZ_Convention.htm], meaning the principles of regular XY Notrump is valid even after a one of a suit (X) - one of a suit (Y); one of a suit (or notrump) (Z) auction. It replaces such a method as [[Fourth suit forcing]]. == Notes == * [http://bridgehands.com/X/XYZ_Convention.htm A publication on the XYZ variation of the XY Notrump convention] * [http://org.ntnu.no/mareritt/boasys04.pdf A system publication based on Baard Olav Aasan methods, concerning particularly Transfer Walsh and XY no trump (in Norwegian)] == See also == * [[Walsh convention]] * [[Transfer Walsh]] * [[New minor forcing]] * [[Checkback Stayman]] {{WPCBIndex}} [[Category:Bridge conventions]]
